# Documentation Guidelines for AI_PVSim

## Markdown Style
- Use proper heading hierarchy (start with h1, don't skip levels)
- Include a table of contents for longer documents
- Use code blocks with language specifiers for syntax highlighting
- Keep line length reasonable for readability

## Content Guidelines
- Write clear, concise explanations
- Include practical examples
- Use diagrams or images when they add clarity
- Keep documentation up-to-date with code changes

## README Structure
- Project description and purpose
- Installation instructions
- Usage examples
- Contributing guidelines
- License information

## Technical Documentation
- Explain the "why" not just the "what"
- Include formulas and equations using LaTeX notation when needed
- Provide references to academic papers or standards
- Include units and physical context for PV-related values
